Newton Developer Technical Information: Newton Programmer's Guide: 2.1 OS Addendum /

Chapter 11 Miscellaneous

This chapter lists miscellaneous changes to the Newton 2.1 OS that are not lengthy enough to warrant their own chapters . It is organized first by type of information (data structures, protos, constants, and functions and methods), and then by Newton Programmer’s Guidechapter.
